body.p:
Hd Qrs 1st Ky Cav
Camp Near Lost Mountain Geo
June 14" 1864.
Gov Bramlette
Sir -- I have the honor to recommend to you for promotion the following officers --
Captain Thomas Rowland Co "K" 1st Ky Cav to be promoted to Major vice Maj Drye Resigned, this for Gallant Conduct in many battles & skirmishes.

1st Lt Phillip Roberts Co "K" 1st Ky Cav to be made Captain same "Co" vice Rowland promoted. Tilford N Bruner 2nd Lt Co "K" 1st Ky Cav to be made 1st Lt same "Co" vice Roberts promoted, 2nd Lt James S Pankey Co "I" 1st Ky Cav to be made Capt Co "I" vice Capt Smith Risigned. Thomas Graves orderly Sergt Co "I" 1st Ky Cav to be made 1st Lt same "Co" vice Pankey promoted. 2nd Lt Joseph D Beatie Co "L"
1st Ky Cav to be made Captain same "Co" vice Capt Fishback Resigned. Granville. I. Vaught orderly Sergt Co "L" to be made 2nd Lt vice Beatie promoted,

I am Sir
Very Resptly
your obt Servt
S Adams
Lt Col 1st Ky Cav

P. S
George H Norton ^asst Surgeon^ vice A. G Huffman resigned
